pyrsgis.raster.export¶

pyrsgis.raster.export(band, ds, filename='pyrsgis_outFile.tif', dtype='default', bands=1, nodata=- 9999, compress=None)[source]¶

> If dtype is default and matches with ds, use int16. > If dtype is default and disagrees with ds, use ds datatype. > If a dtype is specified, use that.
